library(rmdtools)
library(SeminarMatching)

setwd("D:/libraries/SeminarMatching/semedit_app/rmd")

  round2_date = today,

  semester = semester,
  studmode = "latecomer"
)
copy.into.env(params)
.GlobalEnv$knit_print.Date = function(x,...) {
  restore.point("whisker_print.date")

}
